title: Season 2, Episode 7: The Rural-Urban Divide
itunes:author: Kathy Cramer, Tory Mallett, Denise Baron, and Chris Gilson
description: Contributor(s): Kathy Cramer, Tory Mallett, Denise Baron, and Chris Gilson | The distance between America’s rural and urban communities have become a pivotal element of politics and elections. Professor Kathy Cramer has spent the last decade investigating the attitudes and identities that have contributed to this divide, and in this episode, we dive into that work with her and PhD candidate Tory Mallett.
